website_summaries.verdict: Well built, affordable and sturdy, but not for those with extremely limited mobility.
pros: Lightweight, yet holds up to 250 pounds
Great for smaller showers and tubs
cons: Doesn't swivel and has no armrests, so not as friendly for people with limited mobility or those who have trouble staying upright without support

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if made properly.
customer_reviews.text: So this supposedly comes with everything you need. The legs have a 1 and a 2 on them, and you line those up with the numbers. Great. Done. Screwed in with the attached screws. Tried to add the cross brace? Nope. Tightened down with a screw that is super hard to undo. At the wrong angle. I'm going to have to find someone to help me undo it. And as the legs and screws are in predetermined slots, I can't adjust the angle on those.
customer_reviews.author: chem gurl

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: easy to get on and off. my husband broke his leg at work and isn't allow any weight bearing on his leg, this shower chair has been easy for him to use with out any one helping him. we do have a walk in shower which also makes it easier to use this chair. i would recommend this chair. also my husband weighs 250, holds him well
customer_reviews.author: teresa haney

customer_reviews.title: Got a defective one
customer_reviews.text: I got a defective one where the crosspiece (factory assembled) was off by just enough that it wouldn’t fit the legs. Also, It’s really very small.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us.
customer_reviews.text: I had a knee replacement and it was suggested that some kind of shower chair would be helpful. So we found this one and set it up. I didn't need one with a back or handles, just something to sit on for the legs and toes. This has worked very well for me. It is adjustable and my husband said it was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This chair is easy to assemble, very sturdy and has great non-slip feet for use in a shower. After foot surgery I needed to have a seat in the shower, and this was the perfect solution. The design is functional, not eye-candy, but serves the purpose 100%. I would definitely recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: H. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and will support
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my elderly father. He sometimes feels week in the shower. He put the whole chair together himself. He said it was very sturdy and will do well in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lamorgese

customer_reviews.title: Rusting after 7 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased almost 7 months ago and already rusting. Didn’t last long!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy , adjustable
customer_reviews.text: It seems real sturdy , for any price . Negative reviews are ALL about assembly . READ THE INSTRUCTIONS FIRST ! Don't tighten anything down until you have it all together ! No problems ! Basic assembly procedures for anything ! I found assembly very easy . If you have arthritis in your hands , you may need a helper to tighten the thumb screws .
customer_reviews.author: Gwlans

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and good quality chair for the price. It is compact and comfortable. Only reason 4 stars is that it came missing a screw and the difficult installation of the crossbar support. no adjustment was supposed to be necessary but I think mine was defective and I had to unscrew the crossbar in order fit the angles to install onto the legs of the chair which was a bit of a pain. Customer support was great in sending the missing screw.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together, wife loved it post-partum
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted this after delivering our newborn so she could wash easily at home in the shower. She said it was a lifesaver. I assembled it and it took about 5 minutes. Everything lined up just fine, which I was worried about reading the reviews; I think people are tightening everything up as they go, which is never a good idea when assembling something. Loose fit it all and then tighten and the cross brace fits perfectly. It was very sturdy and since my wife has recovered, we have left it in the shower because we can prop our feet up to wash them easier and it's just simply convenient. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: The chair is excellent. I have seen other types in friends' homes, and I like this one better. I weigh 230 lbs, 72 y.o., and it doesn't flex at all. Adjustable height makes it easy to get up & down. I am not so handicapped that I need a shower chair, but sitting while the shower pours down on me is VERY nice! Washing the lower extremities while sitting is easier and safer. I wish that I had bought this long ago.
customer_reviews.author: Win Marks

customer_reviews.title: Great overall sturdy chair for shower, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy chair for the shower, with an ingeniously clever way to easily assemble. Note, if a real heavy person would advise sitting directly onto the chair and not at an angle so that it does not tip; having shower grip bars in your shower should help (and should be required) to make getting on and off the chair easy/safer. Best that I've seen on the market as got this for a friend who has one of those IMO, ridiculously impractical low built in shower corner seat? already molded into the shower. Would highly recommend, overall a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Hans Eecker

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I do like the bench length and curvature for sitting on. The only negative I have is that you need to retighten the wing nuts every couple of days. It would be nice if the wing nuts had some sort of locking device to keep them tight. Those of us using this type of device usually have some disability necessitating the benches use. Retightening the wing nuts often is not easy for those of us with osteoarthritis in the hands.
customer_reviews.author: Mickster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shower bench
customer_reviews.text: What is not to like about this shower bench? It was a breeze to assemble, especially after having watched the short video showing the procedure, which was helpful. Upon using the shower bench for the first time, I was pleasantly surprised how perfectly stable and secure it felt, unlike my previous stool that had legs which constantly bent one way or another, always making me feel like it was going to collapse, despite always tightening the screws before use. I hope this shower bench lasts a long time without becoming unstable. I would definitely recommend this product for anyone who feels they need to be able to sit while showering in order to feel stable.
customer_reviews.author: caraj

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this to everyone
customer_reviews.text: First. The assembly booklet is absolutely the very best I've ever seen. The type is large. Written in English and absolutely clearly perfect. For others that write assembly instructions, THIS IS YOUR EXAMPLE. THE IS TOP QUALITY. Well made. Well organized. No tools needed to assemble. The bolt are T-bolt. No missing parts. And if they are, they are free with a phone call. Absolutely a bargain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ww

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little bench if you don’t need something bigger or a backrest
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!, Easy to assemble and light weight. No slipping and no bending on my 6’ and 200lbs and height adjust fits well. It is small but just what I needed after braking an ankle. Could sit on the edge of the tub and slide over with no tipping. And when not using, small enough just to leave in front of Tub not in the way of others to use shower.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but the assembled cross-beam support was not a good fit.
customer_reviews.text: The assembled cross-beam support that attaches to the four legs was not a good fit and needed to be forcibly pressed into place. However, once assembled, the seat is quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I was initially concerned about my order, as it was not new. No screws were included, despite scratches on the metal legs indicating that it had been assembled. I called and expressed my concern to the customer service representative, and offered to return the product in exchange for a new one. Within a few days, I received a box with a brand-new bath stool assembly. It was very simple to follow the directions and assemble the stool, which was a necessity for my mother to shower safely in her tiny round shower. What a pleasure to work with a company with great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: How a product performs
customer_reviews.text: Unless the floor of the shower is absolutely flat, the chair wobbles and in fact my husband fell of the chair. Very poor contruction
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: Great seat in an emergency situation
customer_reviews.text: My wife developed a slight herniation in her back and was unable to stand or sit very well. We both are healthy but this came out of left field. So I needed a seat for our shower that she could use when she was able to maneuver enough that she could take one. There are many on Amazon, but what I liked about this one was the cross bars that help with the stability of the chair. It works great, and came in quickly since that's what we needed. It was very easy to assemble with thumb screws and I had it together in about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: GStreet

customer_reviews.title: Good but smells like URINE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I'm very pregnant and needed assistance when I shaved. The product itself is great and assembly was very simple. It's also very light-weight yet sturdy. But when I first opened the product, it smelled STRONGLY of urine! Not subtly, but STRONGLY like someone had peed on it and left it sitting for a few days. And no, I definitely DID NOT pee on it myself! I would know if I had done it. The smell of urine was so strong, I had actually thought our cat peed in the bathroom. I gave it a good wipe-down and I'm hoping the smell will go away soon.
customer_reviews.author: Young Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Could be even better if little wider and included shower nozzle holder
customer_reviews.text: Improved instructions now make assembly a piece of cake. They have modified their instructions re fitting all the pieces together loosely before hand tightening all bolts. The height is nice at maximum extension, yet still very sturdy with crossbar support. I wish the seat was a little wider to use as support while sitting or standing, and I also wish it had a shower nozzle holder, as I have to temporarily hold it between my knees to use washcloth and soap. Otherwise, very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dolan/Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fits my needs perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to purchase this stool because other reviewers said it was too small. I’m 5’9” slightly overweight and have no balance issues. This stool is perfect! It’s adequate in size & height and most importantly takes up very little space in the shower. It’s easy to move aside to squeegy after showering. It was very easy to assemble too.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Not disappointed at all. Really easy assembly. Sturdi?? Seems to be; it's a plastic/metal shower bench. Will update this review if that opinion should change. Stable?? Seems to be; I'm going to sit on it and it seems like it will serve the purpose. Studi & Stable?? Why not give it a perfect rating? Because I wanted one that would nicely fit in my shower without taking up any more space than necessary. Of course, wider legs in all directions would make it more stable, but that's not what I bought. Seems to be on the first go that it's going to do what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Grant

customer_reviews.title: This is one great shower chair.
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't believe how well this chair was designed and how easy it was to put together. There's a detailed video on line and the written instructions are crystal clear. No super human strength, technical knowledge or tools required. If you need a shower chair, get this one. It's comfortable, height adjustable and sturdy. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Nice stool
customer_reviews.text: First of all, zero stars for ease of assembly! There are not enough available cuss words to use while putting this thing together!! Assembly seems like it should be very simple. It is anything but!!!! However, if you’re having a bad day and need something to smack or take your frustration out on, assembly will be a breeze. Once together, and trust me it shouldn’t have been this hard, it’s a very nice and sturdy stool and I’m sure it will be very helpful as I recover from hip surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very strong and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: In the shower, have trouble standing very long. Work great. When you put it together, you need to put the cross price together first, don't tighten it down , lose fit. Then put it on the seat, after it is fitted slowly tighten it a little at a time by working to each one to tighten. The only thing I wish the seat was a bit bigger, but it was great seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bath Seat
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the product. It was easy to assemble, the written instructions were very clear; and there is an online YouTube video instruction if needed. All of the parts are clearly marked and I like the "X" bracket that provides extra stability for the seat which other similar seats do not have. The seller sends a follow-up email to insure that you have everything you need to assemble the seat and are happy with it. My wife uses the seat and she is very pleased with the item.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E. Comaty

customer_reviews.title: Light as a feather yet sturdy as a rock
customer_reviews.text: Dr. Kay's got this chair to me really fast. It was well packaged and in perfect shape when it came in. Out of all the chairs I've had this one is the best. It's very sturdy and appreciably smaller than a similar one I had. It's also light as a feather so getting it in and out of the tub is a piece of cake. Best of all no water is dripping out of it when I pull it out of the tub. Yay, no more puddles to clean up. I would highly recommend this unit to anyone looking at these types of chairs.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Sturdy and Safe!!! Pleasantly Surprised.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, who has disabilities. He is 6’11.5” tall and weighs 400 lbs. this chair is the perfect size for him. It fits in the tub perfectly and holds his body weight. We tried several online, but they did not hold up. Very sturdy, and safe. Easy to put together too. I researched and bought several others like this one, but they were not well- made. I highly recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Stable Shower Seat
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this shower bench. It is all the things the information says it is - sturdy, stable and a good size to fit in our small shower. Assembly is easy if you attach the cross stays first, then the legs and then attach to the seat. My husband is 6 foot 200 pounds and was a good size for him.
customer_reviews.author: EsJ

customer_reviews.title: I'm not often this pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed while assembling this! The pieces were all there, the directions are thorough and well written, and the pieces are strong and sturdy...FAR better than the stuff that comes from China. Nice that the screws are plastic thumbscrews--easy to operate, and no tools needed whatsoever. The stool is stable and sturdy in my shower. Not quite as nice looking as my old one, but from the looks of it, this one won't break!
customer_reviews.author: S. Kloss

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Incredible.  Best assembly instructions I have ever seen!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was recently out of town helping a friend with a foot injury. While I was there, one of these shower seats was delivered. Both my friend and I are older and have written many hundreds of pages of documentation over the years. I have NEVER in all my years seen better assembly documents for any product. The quality is excellent - the assembly is NO TOOL (which also translates to no-tool adjustments/tightening, etc.) I would recommend this to anyone. Frank
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and sturdy enough for me.
customer_reviews.text: This chair was the perfect shower solution for my needs. Having had bone spur/Achilles surgery, I needed a short term solution for showering. It was easy to assemble. It’s lightweight but sturdy enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: usfoodman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Engineering and Assembly Instructions
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet; it only arrived today. The product was engineered with assembly in mind, and combined with detailed illustrated instructions, it only took me 30 or 40 minutes to assemble. If you find that the crossbar doesn’t fit as it should, you are trying to attach it to the wrong legs. Rotate it 90 degrees and attach as instructed. The parts are often labelled with letters or numbers that are keyed off in the assembly instructions. The parts fit very well, and for the price it’s a minor miracle in my opinion. Well, I’ll plan to revise this review once I’ve used it a while.
customer_reviews.author: S. Zaslaw

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Made in U.S.A.!
customer_reviews.text: So glad the unit was available for next day arrival! My husband just came home from the hospital and needed something sturdy and able to be used in a small bathtub. I put it together in about 15 minutes. So easy, thank you! All hardware were plastic over-molded onto metal as wing nut type so easy for me to install. Clever design. It’s held up great for a big man to use so I’m glad we bought this. And it’s made in America!!!
customer_reviews.author: Issaquah-Alli

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: After orthopedic surgery it was recommended that I use this in the shower. I did not use it as a seat but to have a support. It worked well for that and is sturdy. It is easy to put together. The openings on the handles are nice for storing bath brushes or sponge.
customer_reviews.author: F. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: A little painful to assemble but did the job and would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after having a surgery on my calf that did not allow me to stand while showering. It was kind of a pain to assemble and there was one screw that didn't all the way screw in, but once it was assembled it was fine. the height adjusted nicely for me and I'm 6 ft tall. It felt fairly stable, could have been maybe more so if it was a heavier item but it held my over 200 lb just fine.
customer_reviews.author: ShellyBelle

customer_reviews.title: Strong, and the legs stayed put in my bathtub
customer_reviews.text: I used this shower stool after breaking my ankle. It was affordable enough that I didn't feel guilty purchasing this for short term use, but it's sturdy enough that it'll last if you need it for long term care. The nuts that screw the legs in are large, so it's very easy to put together. Now that I don't need it for a shower stool, I put a cushion on it and am using it as a regular stool. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P

customer_reviews.title: just got it.
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today, unable to give an honest opinion. BUT Assembly was fast and easy and it is certainly sturdy enough even for my fat A-- ! Plus, it is attractive and easy to move out of ones way. Looking forward to my next shower !!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chair allows me to sit without any fear of falling!
customer_reviews.text: Instead of sitting on the side of tub to reach my feet, I sit on this stable chair. It is sturdy. The 4-star rating is due to the fact that the seat is a little hard. If it were padded, I would have given it 5-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great bench!
customer_reviews.text: Very reasonable price compared to local medical supply stores and this bench is actually nicer. It arrived quickly and was easy to put together. It is very sturdy and very comfortable. It has large rubber feet to keep the bench from sliding, even when the tub floor is wet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Shower Chair
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONE , after reading the reviews and comparing the different shower chairs, decided on this one. I made the right choice the X brace makes it very sturdy and stable. Very good assembly instructions makes assembly easy. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: REC

customer_reviews.title: I just need a replacement hand screw and metal washer
customer_reviews.text: Itried to call and directed to send email. I just wrote to ask for Hand screw and metal washer. I have one that is stripped. I don't need another sheet of instuctions and I cannot get out to send this back at this time with COVID19. Please read my first request so that I can use Dr Kays Bath Seat. Karen Moros
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Supportive shower bench. Very stable
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to assemble and well made. Great support. Mom uses it in the shower and had no problem with it. I will occasionally check to make sure nothing has loosened up just to be careful but I'm confident that Mom will be ok with it. Feet grip/supports are good. Her shower is pretty flat and it sits well. She is only 150 lbs but I think this seat can take much more weight. Very stable and well made!
customer_reviews.author: cookinmama

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves this chair.
customer_reviews.text: My so just donated 68% of his liver to his mom, my wife. The transplant team recommended a shower chair,so my first stop was Amazon. Two days later we received the chair. I had it assembled in ten minutes and was surprised how easy it went together and yet sturdy. My wife loves this chair and uses its every day. We recommend this chair to anyone needing a shower chair I give it a 12/10.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Laverty

customer_reviews.title: I feel safe and secure with the shower chair.
customer_reviews.text: After reading numerous reviews regarding different types of shower chairs, I decided to purchase Dr. Kay’s. I am quite happy with the purchase. I broke my ankle in two places and this chair allows me to sit without putting weight on the ankle. I feel safe sitting on the chair although it is not as sturdy as I wish it could be. The chair hasn’t slipped while I’ve used it in the shower. I’m about 118lbs, so. Feel comfortable that it can withstand my weight. I’ve had to tighten the hand screws on the chair, but that should be done every time it’s used for safety precautions in my opinion. I am happy with my purchase and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: La Vita Casper

customer_reviews.title: Useful for shower and bath post surgery
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to assemble... especially the cross bars, so I left them off and the chair seems stable enough without them... Tried everything, but could not get the crossbars attached. Also note that this seat does not fit in a clawfoot tub or any more narrow (maybe older) tub...
customer_reviews.author: Eliz.H

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfectly into a small space in my shower. I am a slightly overweight and feel perfectly safe and stable on this chair. I had been thinking about it and hadn't made up my mind about what chair I wanted and hit the button by mistake and ordered this chair and very glad I did. Only wish it went up a bit higher by at least a click or two. Would definitely buy again and refer it to others. The site it came from even sent me a youtube link to show how to put the chair together even though the directions enclosed were very easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Overall excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Bath Stool: starting with the instructions, whoever wrote them should be given a Pulitzer prize. They are explicitly clear, step by step text and graphics. Assembly is simple and ergonomically designed so a person with hand articulation problems should be able to put it together. All materials, aluminum tubing, plastic seat and feet, are top quality as are the screws and washers. The size is right for my shower as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ed P

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The chair was very easy to assemble. The company even sent and e-mail with a video prior to receiving the chair. No guessing or reading instructions. Assembled in a few minutes with no tools. Fits my wife and I well (5'4", 5'9"). Only negative may be that if you're tall, an inch or two higher might be better. It does adjust but maybe not enough for someone tall. Works well for us.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! Got this for my mom who can be a bit unsteady at times. I assembled it in maybe 15 minutes. I would say that if you have arthritis or a weak grip it might take more time to assemble, but I think it is still a better assembly process than if you had to use screws and a screwdriver. Mom said she doesn't know why she didn't get one sooner hah.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Amos

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bench type shower chair that does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: I am over 6 foot, and about 220, so I needed a nice sturdy bench type chair for my smallish shower. This fits the bill nicely. It doesn't extend as high as I thought it would, but after using it I find the (approx 2in) lower height (than my last one) makes it a bit more sturdy and balanced for me. I can lean out to grab a towel, and not worry about it falling or slipping. Very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: tom m. denham

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit - Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bathroom chair for my husband to sit on after surgery in our shower. Our shower is very tiny and it was concerning whether or not this bench would fit. But all the specifications were exact and the chair fit perfectly! It was comfortable, very easy to clean, very lightweight and extremely inexpensive compared to other chairs. It was made of high-quality materials and I love the handles on the sides so I can just lift it out quickly - no chance of dropping it out of my hands. If you’re looking for a high-quality bathroom bench this is the chair for you!!! No need to look further.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie K.

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: The stool was a great size for our small shower. I had no problem attaching the crosspieces. I didn't tighten all the screws until the end which made it a little awkward after the crosspieces were attached, but it was doable. It didn't slip in the shower and supported my husband with ease. All in all, I think it's a pretty good value and I'd purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bamabelle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I ignored the reviews complaining that the cross bar support doesn't line up with the holes. It lined up perfectly. I also followed one reviewer's advice to not completely tighten the legs to the stool until after attaching the cross bar. It went together easily and quickly. The reviews had me worried I would to have one of my sons do it tor me. It is very sturdy and did not rock in the tub. I am a woman who has a hard time opening jars sometimes, but I was able to put this stool together and tighten the wing nuts myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bench for a small shower.
customer_reviews.text: Fits in our small shower very well. My husband has neuropathy in his feet and felt insecure while showering. He feels much less likely to slip and fall. It's lightweight, yet stable...very easy for us to remove from the shower when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Vi B, Stockton CA

customer_reviews.title: Instruction are easy to understsnd.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble . Feels sturdy and level. Seat is large enough to comfortably seat 200 lbs curvy butt and still leave room to manover in shower . Really like this tub/shower chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer/reader

customer_reviews.title: Small seat but good height and fairly easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The seat was a little smaller than I expected, compared to other shower seats I've seen and owned (I did not pay attention to measurements when ordering!), but it was sufficient. I needed something to put in my small shower after surgery and preferred something a little taller. It was easy to assemble. I did notice the crossbar was a little off, but I simply bent it into the correct position....kind of hard to explain, but it's possible to adjust it pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Received this product the other day. Assembly was easy, no problems making parts fit. Chair appears very sturdy, no wobbling at full seat height, no concern about tipping. Fits easily into my shower. I'n six feet tall and full height setting is just fine. Seat width is fine for me at 175 lbs. If someone is heavier and has a very wide bottom I'm not sure if they'd be maxing out the width or sturdiness, but again this seat seems very sturdy to me due to the X support bar, not at all rickety. Very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Oldman

customer_reviews.title: Fits in my narrow tub.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to take showers and as stool to sit in fron of the sink beacause I cannot stand for long periods of time. I like that it has the cross-section holding the legs, it keeps them sturdy. I have a shower/tub that we use it in. My tub is fairly narrow so I love that is narrow enough to fit. I will reccomend/buy again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Davis

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice little stool....
customer_reviews.text: I have stenosis in my back right now and can not stand. I just stopped taking showers because of that so I started looking for a shower stool. I looked at several and decided on this one. I am now able to shower comfortably. The stool is well made and sturdy. Someone thought this out before manufacturing and selling it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy Product
customer_reviews.text: I weigh about 240 lbs. and the bench has not shown any instability issues. I recently had bunion surgery and cannot get the bandages wet, so I use a cast cover (also purchased on Amazon), but it can be challenging to stand in the shower on only one foot, so the bench insures that I can shower with no worries about slipping and falling. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi M.

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like!
customer_reviews.text: Forget this is made in China. This is a quality made product with nice finishing and materials. It is very stable and provides a secure factor while taking a shower. It is a decent size, has plenty of drain holes and appears easy to wipe clean. As a senior surgery patient, I hope to get a lot of use use from it.
customer_reviews.author: Old Dutch

customer_reviews.title: Great shower seat
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one we’ve purchased. The first was last year for my father-in-law, and the 2nd was for my mother. Both times the seat was delivered promptly and in perfect condition. Assembly was very easy - instructions were very good. Both users report that the seats work great. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Leitner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and smaller, sturdy size for in tub shower use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my dad to use after breaking his hip and returning home from rehab. It was easy to assemble and appears to be sturdy enough for him to use making showering more safe for him. Would recommend for this use.
customer_reviews.author: prhodes81

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well built, and I fell there is no better.
customer_reviews.text: This stool is the best it gets. Not only is it sturdy but well built. It fits in a fiber shower perfect. Made very well construction. I would recommend it to anyone that needs a shower stool. It makes a person feel good when selecting a product that is right for need. Could not find one anywhere to compare. Thank You John
customer_reviews.author: John Lanier

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want a small seat surface.
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy and easy to assemble. The biggest concern is that the seat surface is pretty small.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: I like this shower stool
customer_reviews.text: Recovering from hip replacement and my back also has several stress fractures. I needed something to sit on in our smallish shower and this fits the bill. Lightweight and easy to move, yet sturdy and I feel safe on it. Would recommend. You can make it taller or shorter depending on your preference.
customer_reviews.author: genealover

customer_reviews.title: Safety First
customer_reviews.text: I injured my foot and needed a way to shower. I tried wrapping my crutches in plastic. Crutches in the shower was a bad idea and very dangerous!!! This bench was worth every penny. I was able to shower safely and used it to sit on while I applied makeup. It’s light but sturdy and doesn’t rock or slip.
customer_reviews.author: BadgeBunnyV

customer_reviews.title: Great shower bench for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a hip replacement and have used this shower bench in my standup shower. It was easy to put together, especially after reading other reviews about not to tighten the bolts until after the insert was placed. The seat is on the smaller side, but still left enough room to push up on to stand up. I have found it to be very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: K. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction and doesn’t slip
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Very stable because the legs of the chair are at an angle, which prevents slipping. Feels like it’s solid construction, though light. No rust issues yet, but only had it for a couple weeks. Will report back if there are problems in that area. Get it over a cheaper option. You’ll be thankful in the long run
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: An excellent choice ... an excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this sturdy bath bench. It was easy to assemble, adjustable and provided a helpful, stable bench while showering as I had recently experienced a bad back injury. It is a quality product! It not only fits my tub but a small shower stall should I need it there. Thanks, Dr. Kay!
customer_reviews.author: B. Schumann

customer_reviews.title: Washer Rusted!
customer_reviews.text: All but one of the supplied washers were aluminum and did not rust. The one washer, as shown, was ferrous and began rusting. This is not as advertised nor as one would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J. Plachy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This item was needed temporarily after my wife's surgery. I was about to order a less expensive shower chair until I read the reviews about poor quality, difficult assembly and even collapse! For a few dollars more, this was worry free in all regards. The design & quality were excellent, assembly and adjustment easy (and without tools) and the extra bracing made it strong and stable. Need a reliable shower chair? This is it!
customer_reviews.author: N Moore

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Seat was smaller than expected but still adequate. Easy to put together, no tools needed to assemble was a bonus. Tip, don't tighten hand screws all the way until cross bar is in place. Seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Lpitzen

customer_reviews.title: Great for small showers.
customer_reviews.text: The shower chair was easy to assemble in about 10 minutes. Ordered for my wife's small shower and she loves it. Also during the quarantine my wife has been cutting my hair and this also worked great for me to sit on while having and hair cut and easy to clean afterwards ( wash off with water hose). Highly recommend this seller and product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Palmer

customer_reviews.title: A Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: A life saver! People take for granted something as simple as being able to stand in the shower. Well, it’s not so simple for many of us. This product is simple to assemble, it’s sturdy, and it’s not the size of a battleship. I’m sorry I need it, but I’m ecstatic that I have it.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Love this bench!
customer_reviews.text: The bench was very easy to assemble and is very sturdy. I had my husband sit on it and wiggle around to make sure it would be safe for me to use. I had major foot surgery and needed something dependable to help me. This bench had mixed reviews but we love it. Have actually recommended it to others who see the same orthopedic surgeon as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Frost

customer_reviews.title: Well made , good quality product !!
customer_reviews.text: I took my time looking and reading about all the different shower chairs for my wife who is little. This is the right choice. Water-proof , sturdy , super easy to put together. It goes low to high depending on your height so that's a real good option.Thanks Dr.Kay for making such a good quality product !!!
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: No tools required. Very easy to put together. I had it done it in less than five minutes. Lightweight but strong and sturdy. Doesn't take up too much space in the bathroom. I already have a fold down seat for my shower, but needed a seat for the bathroom in front of my sink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional customer service
customer_reviews.text: I received my order very quickly, and it was followed by an email from the manufacturer thanking me for my selection of their product. And they issued me a fully refundable guarantee of satisfaction. In an environment where customer service is generally deficient, it is refreshing to be valued. The quality exceeded my expectations, it was so simple to assemble and I can proudly recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: A great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this particular shower chair because of its price. I had also ordred a $41 model with instructions to send it to my LaMoure, ND address. Fortunately, I was able to cancel the second order. Amazon, you're the best!~ F C Humphrey (Amazon Prime member) Pocatelloc, ID
customer_reviews.author: F. C. Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to get this chair because I have tried others and the collapse with my weight. This chair not only fit in the small shower I have but hols my weight nicely. It also does not slide if bumped like some others. The most difficult part of assembly was the cross brace, but even that was surprisingly easy, yes it was a tight fit, but that is not a bad thing.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Erenstoft

customer_reviews.title: Love the stability
customer_reviews.text: I broke my foot and needed a safe seat to shower as I can not stand. This seat arrived in 2 days. My son put it together in less than 15 min. It does not slip, slide or tip. I can sit or place my bad foot's knee on it to stand in the shower without fear of falling.
customer_reviews.author: space mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely perfect for my mom. She needs just a little bit of help in the shower and this is definitely on the small side but what is needed for a smaller shower and my mom is not a big person
customer_reviews.author: kitkat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. This chair fits in my tub and I need it only for sitting to shave my legs. It does not have arms & some may find it not sturdy enough if they are still a bit weak. But I’m very happy as I have gotten back most my strength & stability. My husband put it together & said he had no problem. I’m very happy with my chair.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Small footprint fits my stall shower.
customer_reviews.text: Bought because of the cross braces. Good quality of materials, design, and manufacturing. Even though my weight is right at the limit, it feels stable as long as I'm reasonable careful not to tilt or lean too much while sitting. Pleased with purchase. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hopeful2014

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stays in place
customer_reviews.text: I have a sciatica issue is standing in the shower was excruciating. Used a medal folding chair but my master bathroom shower is pretty small. The stool works perfectly. Easy to assemble and leaves room for my knees in the shower. It is comfortable and stays in place. I hope I don’t have to keep using it for the shower but will find another use once standing isn’t so painful.
customer_reviews.author: RED 1

customer_reviews.title: It is strong and stable
customer_reviews.text: I like that the legs are straight and fit in the tub. It is stable. Attaching the crossbar is a little difficult. The trick is to make sure the washer wrap around the leg - it takes two hands, one to twist the screw tab and one to keep the washer at the write angles. A bit fiddly but well worth it when you get it right!
customer_reviews.author: Marian B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, non-skid, adjustable, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted! I don't have a tub, so shaving, foot exfoliating, etc. were difficult before I got this stool. I didn't need any tools, everything to assemble it was in the box. It is comfortable, sturdy, and durable. It doesn't slip or skid while you're sitting on it. It's lightweight so it's easy for an elderly person to move. I love it and recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: nanameem

customer_reviews.title: Great shower stool
customer_reviews.text: This shower stool replaces one that "died" after 2 years. This new stool feels a lot more sturdy. It's easy to put together, lightweight to move around while still able to hold weight. (I weighed close to 300 lbs when we purchased this) So grateful to have this stool.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Purchase And Affordable
customer_reviews.text: What I like it was very easy to assemble. It is very sturdy. And it stay in place when you in tub .
customer_reviews.author: Denise Trammell

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for smaller shower spaces.
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect solution for a smaller shower or tub/shower area. The ability to adjust the height and the design with a handle opening or each side of the seat allows for that extra arm push when getting up from the seat. I had a full knee replacement 2 months ago and this product made taking a shower possible!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Chair
customer_reviews.text: Our household consists of 4 adults with various disabilities. Everyone of us is impressed by the quality of this product and the improvement of the bath experience. This seat is perfect for our shower. Get it - you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Follow the SPECIFIC instructions included with the product!
customer_reviews.text: It took a lot of placing the pieces in different positions before finding the exact right way they belonged together, but after finally getting it right, I am extremely pleased with the outcome! This is a nice shower bench.
customer_reviews.author: Acquisitor@4609

customer_reviews.title: Solid shower stool
customer_reviews.text: Use it to sit and shower with my baby (babies can get slippery!). Very sturdy. Works great. My husband also has nerve damage and back issues so he uses it to stretch his back in the shower, the handles are great for that.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Mason

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Support
customer_reviews.text: It was challenging to put this item together because each component did not line up with the seat. When I did finally complete the process I was very pleased with the outcome. I have back issues and this bench has been a tremendous help to me on a daily basis
customer_reviews.author: Roadrunner

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The product needs to be 2 inches taller for people with spinal injuries ease of rising. Overall I would say it is ok.. One thing we would prefer is a flat seat, not curved. It fits the tub better than the larger sizes for our small restroom. This replaces the previous seat that was well over 30 years old which had started to crack on top pinching skin.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: I'm Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to pretend that I just wanted this shower bench. Unfortunately, I'm getting to be an old man, and I needed it. Setup/assembly was easy. It doesn't slip or slide in my tub. If it came with a backrest I'd never leave the tub. :)
customer_reviews.author: Zeke

product_meta.title: Dr Kay's Adjustable Height Bath and Shower Chair Shower Bench
feature_bullets: LIGHTWEIGHT AND EXCEPTIONALLY STABLE: Don't sacrifice your comfort for safety when you can easily have them both with Dr. Kay's Adjustable Height Shower Seat. Weighs only 4 lbs but can hold 250 lbs.
OUR MAXIMUM HEIGHT IS A FULL 2-INCHES HIGHER: Some of our closest competitors make a similar product, but they skimp on the height - which could leave you struggling. Adjusts from 12.5" to 18.5".
FITS EVEN IN SMALL TUBS AND SHOWERS: The ample anti-slip platform and wide base give this stool maximum stability while the non-slip rubber feet ensure the bench won't slip out from under you.

DESIGNED FOR EASY NO-TOOLS ASSEMBLY: Leave the tools in the garage! Unlike other bath and shower chairs, Dr. Kay doesn't send you a jumble of hard-to-insert screws. No way! Instead, this heavy-duty anodized aluminum seat is specifically designed with professional-grade hand-saving Wing-Tipped screws that can be hand-screwed into place without the use of tools.

EASILY LIFTS WITH BUILT-IN SIDE HANDLES: We want this seat to help make your life easier, so we made it unbelievably lightweight, stable and strong. Tall or short, you'll be able to adjust it to the height that best suits you.
